Class Main.ProductHandler

java.lang.Object
Main.ProductHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
Enclosing class:
Main
static class Main.ProductHandler extends Object implements HttpHandler
Handles HTTP requests for product-related operations.
